properties.entry:
For Microsoft Windows users:
  • Computer Type: PC or PC compatible
  • Operating System: Windows XP Home or Professional, Windows Vista
  • Browsers: Internet Explorer 7.0.5730.11 or above, Mozilla Firefox 3.0.8 or above
  • Computer Speed: Pentium® IV or better
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1GB or greater
  • Java Version: 1.6_13 or above
  • Display Resolution: 1024 x 768 or higher, required
  • Connection Speed: Broadband high-speed internet recommended (DSL, cable, satellite)

For Macintosh users:
Although Macintosh is not a fully supported platform, we do have many users who are successfully using EnterpriseSearch Sorting on the Macintosh platform. Users who have the following system requirements seem to have very few problems:
  • Processor: G4 or Intel MacOS X-compatible processor or higher
  • Operating System: Apple MacOS X version 10.5.x or later
  • Browsers: Safari version 3.2.1 or above, Mozilla Firefox 3.0.4 or above
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1GB or greater
  • Java Version: 1.5.0_16 or later
  • Display Resolution: 1024 x 768 or higher, required
  • Connection Speed: Broadband high-speed internet recommended (DSL, cable, satellite)

For Linux users:
Although Linux is not a fully supported platform, we do have many users who are successfully using EnterpriseSearch Sorting on Linux. Users who have the following system requirements seem to have very few problems:
  • Computer Type: PC or PC compatible
  • Operating System: Redhat Fedora Desktop 10 or higher, Open SUSE 11.1 and above, Ubuntu 8.04 and above
  • Browser: Mozilla Firefox 3.0.8 or above
  • Computer Speed: Pentium® IV or better
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1GB or greater
  • Java Version: 1.6.0_13 or above
  • Display Resolution: 1024 x 768 or higher, required
  • Connection Speed: Broadband high-speed internet recommended (DSL, cable, satellite)
